Eunseong Kim, Associate Professor at Chungnam National University
Eunseong Kim received his B.S. and M.S. degrees in electrical engineering at Seoul National University, Seoul, Korea, and his Ph.D. degree in electrical engineering from Chungnam National University, Daejeon, South Korea in 2005. From 2006 to 2010, he worked as a researcher at the Korea Electronics Technology Institute (KETI), Gyeonggi, Korea, and from 2010 to 2015 he was with the Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute (ETRI) in Daejeon, South Korea.
